item.description:
For those of you who attended the recent after work Live Music event at Hennessy's with Mia Boostom and Ryan McHugh, here is another Conquer artist performing:

Super talented Conquer artist Sarah Borrello is playing at 8pm on Feb 3 at Hard Rock Cafe Boston! BUY TIX TODAY via link below - WILL SELL OUT! Sarah is a captivating singer & award-winning songwriter! Her "blues alternative" sound is intensely strong & unique, bringing to mind Janis Joplin & Fiona Apple. She's sponsored by Conquer artist developer Mia Boostrom (2x America's Got Talent/finalist). Click & select Sarah Borrello: http://flemingentertainment.ticketleap.com/fleming-entertainment-presents-mission-hill-cd-release-show/  

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING CONQUER INDEPENDENT ARTISTS!  Contact: Conquer Certified Artist Developer & recruiter Nina Pickell at 617-513-9631.

============================

Tickets are $14 ($12 plus fees) and includes a Mission Hill CD since it's their CD Release Party! ;)  However, when following the link above, please choose "Sarah Borrello" so she will get credit for the sale. Tickets do get you in for the entire show (Mission Hill CD Release party, 4 different performers).  Doors at 8pm and I should be there about that time.


Hard Rock Cafe is conveniently located in Faneuil Hall on Clinton Street (near McCormick & Schmick).  It is close to the Orange and Green Lines (Haymarket) or Blue and Green Lines (Gov't Center) and a short walk (Park Street) to the Red Line. 

YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR OWN FOOD AND DRINK.  So, please maintain your own tab or pay as you go.  And don't forget to tip your servers/bartenders! :)

THIS EVENT IS CROSS-LISTED WITH SOCIAL FUN.  I hope to see you there!
item.name: Live Music at Hard Rock Boston - Sarah Borrello
